content.en_US: FMJs do not deform when hitting a soft target, meaning they deliver less damage. However, it allows them to pierce armor more effectively. All FMJs have some armor-piercing properties, as well as added damage threshold negation based on the caliber size.
content.zh_CN: 全金属被甲弹（FMJ）在击中较软目标时不会解体，因此造成的伤害较低； 然而其特性使得其能够更高效地穿透护甲。所有种类的全金属被甲弹都有一定 的穿甲能力，以及因口径而异的无视伤害阈值的能力。
